thread.title: All You Need To Know About Kim Kardashian's 35th Birthday!
thread.title_full: All You Need To Know About Kim Kardashian's 35th Birthday!

title: All You Need To Know About Kim Kardashian's 35th Birthday!
text:
All You Need To Know About Kim Kardashian's 35th Birthday! Written by: Chaitra Published: Friday, October 23, 2015, 11:19 [IST] 
The reality TV show star Kim Kardashian turned 35 on October 21. It seems like she had a blast from the very start of her birthday. Wishes poured in from family, friends and mostly fans. Fans all over the world went a little too fad and celebrated their favorite reality show star's birthday! 
While the Queen K has everything she would ever need in her life and family members that could give her literally anything under the sun, the KUWTK star had just 3 wishes to make. One was to have a son, the second was to expand the family and third, get skinny! 
Kim's expressed her wish to expand the family. She's always wanted a big family and with her son to be delivered soon she couldn't be any less excited. After North West and a lot of trying Kim is pregnant with her second child. 
Kim has always been worried about the pregnancy weight gain and during her second pregnancy she's just waiting to shed those extra pounds once Kanye Jr is born in December according to the reports. 
Kanye West took his wife to Cin√©polis Luxury Cinemas at The Promenade in Westlake, California only to surprise her with a birthday party with many members from the family and outside. Kim went to the theatre assuming she was going to watch the Steve Jobs movie! 
Kim Kardashian's younger sister Khloe Kardashian didn't just not make it to her b'day party, but also upset the birthday girl by announcing her decision on dismissing the divorce with her ex-husband Lamar. Khloe stayed at the hospital with Lamar Odom who was in coma after overdosing on Viagra at a brothel. 
Though Khloe couldn't make it to Kim's B'day party, she put up an extremely sweet post to wish her sister and captioned it, ""You continuously amaze me by how you do it all. Thank you for always being there for everyone! Today is about you!!! Enjoy it Mrs West!!!" 
Read here the entire story on Lamar's overdosing on herbal Viagra. 
And the Jenner sisters, Kendall and Kylie who were busy with their Balmain x H&M collaboration launch recently managed to be at their Sister's Birthday party. The girls also twerked on the stage for Backstreet Boys' performance during the Launch. 
Read here to know more about Kylie and Kendall at the Balmain x H&M collaboration launch 
Rob Kardashian who's been a little aloof from KUWTK show, wished his sister Kim on Instagram saying, "Happy birthday Kimbu . Thanks for always feeding me cheese fries all day baby," 
Just like all the other members of the family, Kris put up a post Kim on Instagram and captioned it as, "You are the most amazing daughter, wife, sister, Mother, ROOM MATE, and best friend," she wrote on Instagram. "God has blessed me with you and it has been the most wonderful 35 years. I love you beyond words Mommy." 
Irrespective of who was there and who wasn't, Kim's b'day was an amazing one. Thanks to her musician husband, Kanye West, who surprised her with things that only people belonging from Kardashian family can afford!
